title: Stochastic Control Barrier Functions for Economics
abstract: arXiv:2312.12612v2 Announce Type: replace  Abstract: Control barrier functions (CBFs) and safety-critical control have seen a rapid increase in popularity in recent years, predominantly applied to systems in aerospace, robotics and neural network controllers. Control barrier functions can provide a computationally efficient method to monitor arbitrary primary controllers and enforce state constraints to ensure overall system safety. One area that has yet to take advantage of the benefits offered by CBFs is the field of finance and economics. This manuscript re-introduces three applications of traditional control to economics, and develops and implements CBFs for such problems. We consider the problem of optimal advertising for the deterministic and stochastic case and Merton's portfolio optimization problem. translated_title: 针对经济的随机控制屏障函数
translated_abstract: 控制屏障函数（CBFs）和安全关键控制近年来在航空航天、机器人学和神经网络控制系统领域得到了快速增长的应用，CBFs可以提供一种计算高效的方法，监测任意主控制器并实施状态约束以确保整体系统安全。本文重新介绍了传统控制在经济学中的三个应用，并为此类问题开发了CBFs。文章考虑了确定性和随机情况下的最优广告问题以及默顿的投资组合优化问题。数值模拟用于展示在应用传统控制解决方案与CBFs和随机CBFs相结合下解决此类问题的有效性。
tldr: 本文在经济学领域重新引入传统控制方法，开发并实施了控制屏障函数（CBFs），并通过数值模拟展示了在解决最优广告和投资组合优化等问题时利用传统控制解决方案与CBFs的有效性。
